Igneous Systems | Seattle | Startup | ONSITE

-Software Engineers- Working across the stack in Golang for our data storage and protection platform, plus Kubernetes and Docker.

-Product Manager- Youâ€™ll drive a highly successful launch, help evolve our product offering, own our direction around pricing, packaging, partnerships, and help define overall GTM strategy for cloud services.
